TextView.android:text: Attempting to wholly understand this movement can truly be overwhelming. There is so much to learn and so much information readily available that it can often be confusing to know how to actually make a difference. If you are here reading and looking for ways to help out, you have already taken the first step of helping out. Being educated on this matter is highly important before you can go out and make change. Now that you have a decent understanding of what this movement is about, there are a few other steps you can take that would really help make an impact on the world.

The four key things that any person can do to help is to donate, sign petitions, show up to protests, and vote if you are old enough to. If you are able to do any or all of these things, it will help make a truly lasting change in our country. It is time we see real change for all of these movements and down below is how you can do your part. It is also important to just reach out and check in on friends and family. Share your resources and have difficult conversations with the more close-minded people of our societies. Be an ally in any way possible because staying silent only adds to the oppressions that have already been going on for much too long.

Donating is a crucial part of every movement. Notable organizations already fully commit to this cause and do incredible work and even the smallest donation can help advance significant changes in our society. Aside from donating money, you can also donate your time to these organizations who are always looking for volunteers to help out.
March For Our Lives is a student led organization focused on ending gun violence specifically in schools - \nhttps://marchforourlives.com/
Everytown for Gun Safety focuses on ending gun violence in all communities and they have multiple branches focusing on different issues related to gun control and violence. - https://everytown.org/
Brady has many programs including combating crime guns, educating gun owners, educating the youth, and going to court with the gun industry. - \nhttps://www.bradyunited.org/

Giffords is an organization that is focused on 3 key points when it comes to gun violence. They believe there must be a change in American culture, they propose new gun policies, and they hold the gun lobby accountable for profiting off the public. - https://giffords.org/
The Coalition to Stop Gun Violence (CSGV) - Their mission is to stop gun violence through evidence based solutions. - https://www.csgv.org/

Here are a few to get started on. It just takes a few clicks to help push forward the change! These petitions below are all targeted at creating stricter gun control laws. For more details on each specific petition click on the links below.
For many more petitions related to gun violence and control check out - https://www.change.org/t/gun-control

March For Our Lives created the biggest change and gained the most support through protests. This movement was student-led and created a huge impact on the gun control world. If high schoolers can create an entire movement that over a million people came out to support, imagine what they could do with your help. When the first march happened on March 24, 2018, more than 800 protests were planned in every state on every continent except Antarctica. Therefore, no global citizen can use the excuse that there was a lack of local protests that you could have not have participated in. Innocent children are dying across the country and no one is doing anything about it. The government has not made one change to the Second Amendment that was created in 1791. Thousands of people die and the government has done nothing, so do not just sit on your couch and read this and forget about it, because one day, that could be you, or your child, or any loved one. Demand change and show up to support the end of gun violence in this country.

The most important way to construct change when it comes to the gun control movement is through public policies and bills. The gun control movement can be greatly affected by who is elected to office and what policies are put into effect by those in office. People need to start using the power they have been given by this country to see real advancements. Voting is a way for one to control what happens to themselves and the society he or she is a part of. To make America a safer place with less gun violence and mass murders, individuals must vote for representatives in favor of these modifications. How many more people have to die before a real transformation is finally implemented? The answer is no more after today and by voting, you can help make sure it becomes that way and remains that way for the very near future.
